AND AE.EVENT_CODE = #{searchCode}
AND AE.EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND AE.EVENT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND EP.PRIZE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND ( AE.EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR AE.EVENT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR EP.PRIZE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR EP.PRIZE_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY AE.EVENT_ID DESC OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT AE.EVENT_ID, AE.EVENT_CODE, AE.EVENT_TITLE, AE.EVENT_CONTENT, AE.EVENT_CREATE_ID, AE.EVENT_CREATE_DATE, AE.EVENT_UPDATE_ID, AE.EVENT_UPDATE_DATE, AE.EVENT_START_DATE, AE.EVENT_END_DATE, EP.PRIZE_ID, EP.PRIZE_NAME, EP.QUANTITY, EP.PRIZE_DESC FROM ADMIN_EVENT AE LEFT JOIN EVENT_PRIZE EP ON AE.EVENT_ID = EP.EVENT_ID WHERE AE.EVENT_ID = #{eventId}
